meaning_str.bing:
n. 代；（统称）一代人；（家史中的）一代；一批
网络. 世代；产生；发生

代；（统称）一代人；（家史中的）一代；一批

一代；代；一代人的时间；一代人；同代人；同辈人；产生

1.en: As such, we need to prepare the next generation of entrepreneurs to meet the challenges brought by the global nature of enterprise.
1.cn: 就此而言，我们必须为下一代创业者做好准备，以满足全球化企业带来的挑战。

2.en: Here's one of the biggest phenomena of our generation and I get to add my own voice to it!
2.cn: 这里是我们这代人最大的文化现象之一，而我将要在这之中添上我自己的见解！

3.en: I feel honored to have known Steve Jobs. He was the most innovative entrepreneur of our generation. His legacy will live on for the ages.
3.cn: 认识乔布斯是我的荣幸。他是我们这一代里最有创造力的企业家。他的影响将一直存在。

0.en: It has to be earned, by every generation.
0.cn: 它必须是由每一代人所赢得的。

1.en: This generation, your generation, I know, has developed a finely honed radar for B.S.. Can you say B.S. at Harvard?
1.cn: 我知道，你们这一代人为商业学校模式的发展做出了贡献。可以在哈佛提起“商业学校”的字眼吗？

2.en: One Star Trek: The Next Generation phaser. That's Leonard's. Children's toy.
2.cn: 一把《星际迷航：下一代》里的相位枪，莱纳德的。儿童玩具。

3.en: Because this is “Who Belongs With Who”, “The Next Generation.” This question's for you guys.
3.cn: 因为这是谁属于谁，第二代，专门给你们这一代出的问题。

4.en: Finch, remember that quaint little town that made transponders? Could this be the next generation?
4.cn: 芬奇，记得那个建转调器的古怪小镇吗？这会不会是下一代？

5.en: Who are they? Ghosts now. Survivors of the wreck of time. These are first generation?
5.cn: 他们是谁？现在是孤魂野鬼，残存的时间幸存者。他们是第一代接待员吗？

6.en: We're gonna build a new operating system on the backbone of NEXT. The next generation of Macintosh.
6.cn: 我们也将打造一个新的操作系统，基于NEXT，下一代的麦金塔

7.en: The first generation made their fortune trading with the French. Pelts and skins. They were hunters.
7.cn: 第一代祖先跟法国人做生意大赚了一笔，买卖皮草，他们是猎人。

8.en: And we celebrate our newest heroes from the 9/11 Generation our veterans from Iraq and Afghanistan.
8.cn: 我们要歌颂我们最新的9/11一代的英雄们，我们来自伊拉克和阿富汗的退伍军人。

9.en: The point is, your generation is charged with this task of breaking through what the body politic has thus far made impervious to change.
9.cn: 关键在于：你们这一代人肩负着打破国家目前改革维艰的局面。

10.en: Tonight's finale is a very big deal in the lives of my generation. You could record the finale. Oh, we are!
10.cn: 今晚的大结局对我这一代人来说是一件大事。你可以把大结局录下来啊。喔，我们录了。

11.en: And in doing so, your class will be armed with more tools of influence and empowerment than any other generation in history.
11.cn: 届时，各位同学在影响力以及自主力方面都会如虎添翼，胜于以往的任何一代人。

12.en: The last people to starve will be the first to suffocate. And your daughter's generation will be the last to survive on Earth.
12.cn: 经历过饥饿的这一波人将会面临窒息，你女儿这代人将是这个地球上的最后一代。

13.en: Well, you can friend me. Okay, thank you. Okay. Okay. Congratulations. You are now officially part of the Facebook generation.
13.cn: 好吧，你可以关注我。好，谢谢你。好了，好了，恭喜！你现在正式成为脸书一代了。

14.en: All right, next question. Kirk or Picard? Oh, well, that's tricky. Original Series over Next Generation, but Picard over Kirk.
14.cn: 好，下一个问题，柯克还是皮卡尔？好难抉择，初代比下一代好看，但皮卡尔比柯克强。

15.en: Why did he leave? He was training a new generation of Jedi. One boy, an apprentice, turned against him, destroyed it all.
15.cn: 他为什么离开？他曾经培养了新一代绝地武士，有个男孩，他的徒弟，背叛了他，摧毁了一切。

16.en: You are the generation that rejected predictions about your detachment and your disengagement, by showing up to vote in record numbers in 2008.
16.cn: 你们这一代人，绝不会让彼此间变得天涯陌路，这从2008年的入学申请人数便可看出。

17.en: So your solution is to promote me and pay me more money so that I can impart my knowledge to the next generation of scientists? Yes.
17.cn: 所以你的解决方法就是给我升职，给我加薪，然后让我能把我的学识传授给下一代的科学家们吗？没错。

18.en: We salute that Greatest Generation who freed a continent from fascism and fought across Pacific Islands to preserve our way of life.
18.cn: 我们向最伟大的一代人致敬，他们解放了法西斯统治下一个大洲并在太平洋的岛屿上战斗保护了我们的生活方式。

19.en: Lamont Library right over there, one generation before us didn't let women through its doors, but by the time we sat in your seat, everything was equal.
19.cn: 那边的拉蒙特图书馆，就在我们之前一代人的时间里，不允许女性进入。但在我们毕业那时，一切都平等了。
